The Startup Rollercoaster

05 Oct 2015 The startup rollercoaster

The startup rollercoaster

Startups are interesting. Let me rephrase it. Startups are really interesting. From the small idea you have over beer to prepping demos for…

Startups are interesting. Let me rephrase it. Startups are really interesting. From the small idea you have over beer to prepping demos for the product, to pitching the product to investors, to receiving the funds for your product, to seeing your startup getting acclaimed by the investors and clients; It is in fact a roller coaster ride.
